page.title: 06St Martin's College (M)
page.content: The buildings used by the college used to be Bowerham Barracks.The old and the new parts look very different from each other.Just before the main gate there is the new library.It has funny shapes,lots of glass and concrete. The main gate is old and has places for big lamps on top so that the coachmen were able to see in the dark. 265 students live in the college.They live in what were the Men's Quarters. These buildings are long and plain. There are over 1000 students there, from all over England training to be teachers.They chose one main subject but have to do lots of other shorter courses as well.They also have to spend time teaching in schools.We have some students in our school at the moment.
